document.full_text: marian hossa scored two power-play goals less than 3 minutes apart to ignite a five-goal outburst by chicago in the second period.
document.title: hossa nets a pair as blackhawks beat sharks, 6-3
lines_and_colors: marian hossa scored two power-play goals less than 3 minutes apart to ignite a five-goal outburst by chicago in the second period.
